column1: Uchi////I had the pleasure of dining at Uchi over the summer!  I met a few friends there
column2: and since our entire party on the reservation hadn't made it yet
column3: the hostess escorted us out to the patio area.  There was ample seating outside while we waited
column4: along with a waitress walking around to take drink orders
column5: as well as offer samplings of some of their menu items.  I thought that all of this was great
column6: excluding the fact that they allowed smoking out there.  I can't take being around smoke and it caused us all to go back inside to finish waiting.  I highly recommend Uchi make this a non-smoking restaurant
column7: even though it is outside on their patio.
